title: Move-in condition apt near Central Street shopping, Metra
posting_body: Lovely 2 BR apt, with large, light-filled living room and open kitchen plan.
Apt is painted, clean and move in condition - pictures have furniture shown for scale.
kitchen with granite breakfast bar opens to dining area; Double cedar lined closets in each bedroom plus coat and linen closets.
Inside bike storage, large storage locker and clean, convenient shared laundry with folding tables/ironing board.
Water and heat are included in the rent.
Walk to everything location in Evanston's Central Street shopping district.
Whole Foods, Starbucks, boutique shops, Metra within 3 blocks.
For more info, floorplans, and information, visit our website - copy/paste into your browser: https://remarkrentals.com/2307-2317-central-1.
